title: SCI-FI Guitars 2 (Industrial Music Loops For Level Design)
description: WAS $24.99 NOW ONLY $15.00 ! This is the second Instalment of SCI-FI GUITARS, like SF Guitars 1, this pack consists of seamless loops, HD audio | 32 minutes 10 Seconds of audio all in the key of D Minor for fluent transitions between scenes.
longDescription:
Welcome To SCI-FI Guitars 2 (Industrial Music Loops For Level Design) Game Developer & Production Music Pack!

SCI-FI Guitars 2 brings you a pack that has been crafted for menu style music & in-game level music, screen titles/background music for your Unreal Project. The asset pack consists of guitar riffs, Synth sounds and heavy industrial style percussion. WAS $24.99 NOW ONLY $15.00 !


TRACK LISTING:

  1. Blinded
  2. Deep Space
  3. Fire Fight
  4. Gears & War
  5. Halo
  6. Head Hunter
  7. Platform 498
  8. Red Sight
  9. Scavage
  10. Wild West


LISTEN TO SCI-FI Guitars 2 (Industrial Music Loops For Level Design) HERE : https://soundcloud.com/jordan-caygill/sci-fi-guitars-2-preview/s-R9KAObnpgws
technicalDetails:
Features:

  •  All music created for seamless/Smooth audio transitions between levels in your game.
  •  Tempo/BPM 78 | Key D Minor
  •  Mixed & Mastered/HD Audio

Number of Audio Wavs: 10

Number of Audio Cues: 10

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 Bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 32 minutes 10 Seconds

Supported Development Platforms: All

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: https://soundcloud.com/jordan-caygill/sci-fi-guitars-2-preview/s-R9KAObnpgws

Important/Additional Notes: Please Email us for customer enquires & additional questions related to our products @ cerberus_audio@outlook.com


PURCHASES & FREQUENTLY ASKED QUESTIONS

  • When You Buy our products they are formatted in WAV audio files/CUES. Customers have enquired about other formats such as MP3 to which are not available.
  • All Music is downloaded directly from the UNREAL ASSET STORE after Purchase.
  • When we submit to UNREAL ENGINE MARKETPLACE our products are packaged as WAV/CUE
  • See TECHNICAL INFORMATION for more details about our products before buying.
